latest_revision.text:
Come to HeatSync Labs during [https://downtownmesa.com/do/2024-easter-eggstravaganza Easter Eggstravaganza 2024] and collect a spooky Easter Egg (while supplies last). 
 
With over 1000 people going around downtown picking up eggs from the local businesses. We will use this opportunity to share about HeatSync Labs while also showing off some fun making.

Come to the Vinyl Cutter Night on Tuesday 03/19/2024 6pm - 9pm if you want to help make Halloween Themed Eggs.

[[Category:Events]]
